StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetModuleNames]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ModuleTypeID int = 3 AS BEGIN
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT M.ModuleId, M.ModuleName, M.URL, M.DisplayOrder, MT.ModuleTypeId, MT.Type FROM USMC.Module M JOIN USMC.ModuleType MT ON MT.ModuleTypeId = M.ModuleTypeId WHERE M.ModuleTypeId = @ModuleTypeID or M.ModuleTypeId = 3 ORDER BY M.DisplayOrder
END
